snippet: Mabel Mercer and Bobby Short shared the stage at Town Hall in an epic concert on May 19, 1968; a concert on Thursday night paid tribute to these titans of cabaret.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews concert tribute to singers Mabel Mercer and Bobby Short, featuring number of top cabaret performers, at Town Hall.
lead_paragraph: Mabel Mercer and Bobby Short shared the stage at Town Hall in an epic concert on May 19, 1968; a concert on Thursday night paid tribute to these titans of cabaret.

headline.seo: Mabel Mercer and Bobby Short Tribute at Town Hall
headline.main: Honoring the Woodstock of the Cabaret Universe
headline.print_headline: Honoring the Woodstock of the Cabaret Universe
